text.__SUMMARY__: Syzygium salicifolium is a species of the genus Syzygium of the flowering plant family Myrtaceae, commonly called "Vellamanchi" in Malayalam. It is commonly seen in evergreen forests. It is endemic to Western Ghats.
text.Description: Syzygium salicifolium is a small tree, up to 6 m tall. Its flowering and fruiting season is from April to May, and its flowers are white.
